Text.Page:
For centuries Sikander has slept. No matter what, we've kept him safe. We exist for Sikander.

We cast out the mekonaris-our own nestbrothers-without a thought when they presumed to wake him! Now Thulsa and Killian would corrupt him?

Thieving wretches! Gods or no, they shall not have him!

No matter the cost, we will stop them.
